page.title: 18LUDFORD _ RECREATION
page.content: An excellent Village Hall & Playing Field opened in 1974, the result of much hard work to raise the money, & now run by a Committee. Playing field used by Ludford Rovers Football Club who play in East Lincs Combination,Div 3 and they organise a successful 5_a_ _side tournament each year attracting teams from wide area. The Hall is the venue for most village social events _ weekly Keep Fit & Yoga classes, Youth Club, Bi_monthly meetings of Parish Council, Annual Old Folks'Xmas Party, Dances, Discos, Wedding Receptions &c. The School also uses these facilities on occasions. The car park is an official Viking Way meeting place for walkers.For indoor sports & swimming villagers go to Louth & Rasen Sports Centres _ Golf at Rasen which also has racecourse: other folk Shoot, Fish, ride horses and local Fox Hunt visits.
